articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: Discord heightens ad focus by introducing video ads to mobile apps in June - Ars Technica
articles.description: Discord looks for more ways to make money ahead of expected IPO.

articles.title: Firefly’s Blue Ghost Captures the First-Ever HD Video of a Stunning Lunar Sunset - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Firefly’s Blue Ghost Mission 1 set a new benchmark for commercial lunar exploration, lasting longer than any previous private mission and delivering 10 NASA instruments to the Moon. The mission achieved several firsts, including the deepest robotic thermal pr…
articles.content: After delivering ten NASA science and technology payloads to the near side of the Moon through NASA’s CLPS (Commercial Lunar Payload Services) initiative and Artemis campaign, Firefly Aerospace’s Blu… [+7430 chars]
